name: Just Get Z
summary: Just Get Z is about starting at A and getting to Z. clicking to match two similar letters together to get to the next letter for you to get on top of the scoreboard. Simply match A's with colorful tiles together to form B's, while matching B's to C's and so on till you get to Z. Challenging right? The higher alphabet you match, the greater you keep going on top of the scoreboard. As you play, the lively colors on the screen brighten up your mood and the sweet music soothes your ears keeping you in a kind of meditation mode making you concentrate and focused, but this fascinating game brightens the brain cells to the core.
